name: wise.com
text: Wise is a cheaper, faster way to send money abroad. Join over 10 million people who get the real exchange rate with Wise. They’re up to 8x cheaper than banks.

name: payoneer.com
text: Payoneer’s cross-border payments platform empowers businesses, online sellers and freelancers to pay and get paid globally as easily as they do locally.

name: digitalocean.com
text: Digital Ocean is designed for developers and built for businesses. Get cloud services your development teams need to succeed. Signup and get $100 of free credits to try them out.

name: vultr.com
text: Easily deploy cloud servers, bare metal, and storage worldwide on Vultr, the Infrastructure Cloud! Signup and get $100 of free credits to try them out.
